DOC.brief_summary: To find information effective safe vardenafil treat impotence men live Russia .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Vardenafil Men With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Males ED accord NIH definition ( inability achieve maintain penile erection sufficient satisfactory sexual performance ) least 3 month . Heterosexual relationship Age range : 18 year older Documented write Informed Consent The subject must make least four attempt sexual intercourse ( accord question subject diary `` Was sexual activity initiate intention intercourse ? '' ) four separate day untreated baseline period . At least 50 % attempts period must unsuccessful , accord follow question subject diary [ least one question answer `` No '' ] `` Were able achieve least partial erection ( enlargement penis ) ? `` , `` Were able insert penis partner 's vagina ? '' `` Did erection last long enough successful intercourse ? '' . Any unstable medical , psychiatric , substance abuse disorder opinion Investigator likely affect subject 's ability complete study precludes subject 's participation study Presence penile anatomical abnormality ( e.g . penile fibrosis Peyronie 's disease ) opinion Investigator would significantly impair erectile function Primary hypoactive sexual desire Spinal cord injury History surgical prostatectomy ( exclude TURP ) . Retinitis pigmentosa History positive test Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) Hepatitis C. History positive test HIV.9 . Severe chronic acute liver disease , history moderate severe hepatic impairment . Clinically significant chronic hematological disease , may lead priapism sickle cell anemia leukemia . Bleeding disorder . Significant active peptic ulceration . Unstable angina pectoris History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month Uncontrolled atrial fibrillation/flutter screening ( ventricular response rate > 100 bpm ) . Resting hypotension ( rest systolic blood pressure < 90 mm Hg ) hypertension ( rest systolic blood pressure > 170 mm Hg rest diastolic blood pressure > 110 mm Hg ) NYHA Class III IV heart failure Symptomatic postural hypotension within 6 month visit 1 . History malignancy within past 5 year ( squamous basal cell skin cancer ) . Concomitant Medication : Subjects take nitrate nitric oxide donor . Subjects take antiandrogens Subjects take androgen . Subjects take anticoagulant , except antiplatelet agent . Subjects receive investigational drug ( include placebo ) within 30 day visit 1.6 . Use treatment ED within 7 day visit 1 study , include oral medication , vacuum device , constrictive device , injection urethral suppository . Subjects take follow potent inhibitor cytochrome P 450 3A4 : HIV protease inhibitor ritonavir indinavir , antimycotic agent itraconazole ketoconazole ( topical form allow ) erythromycin . Subjects take alphablockers . Abnormal Laboratory Values : Subjects serum total testosterone level great 25 % low limit normal accord range test laboratory Subjects serum creatinine > 3.0 mg/dl Elevation AST and/or ALT > 3X ULN . Diabetic subject HbA1c > 12 % .
